mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, department_id, role_id, username, is_male, mobile, age, address, is_admin, is_system, password, tel, id_num, email, hobby, education, card_num, nation, marry, status, remark, create_time, creater, update_time, updater) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMale,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAdmin,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isSystem,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_male = #{isMale,jdbcType=CHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_admin = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_system = #{isSystem,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_num = #{idNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hobby = #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_num = #{cardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marry = #{marry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, department_id, role_id, username, is_male, mobile, age, address, is_admin, is_system, password, tel, id_num, email, hobby, education, card_num, nation, marry, status, remark, create_time, creater, update_time, updater from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select user_id, department_id, role_id, username, is_male, mobile, age, address, is_admin, is_system, password, tel, id_num, email, hobby, education, card_num, nation, marry, status, remark, create_time, creater, update_time, updater from user
select * from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
select * from user where username like #{name}
